org.apache.streams.instagram.api

Class Instagram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.streams.instagram.api.Instagram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Media, Users

    public class Instagram
extends Object
implements Media, Users
    Implementation of all instagram interfaces using juneau.

      • comments

        public CommentsResponse comments(String media_id)
        Description copied from interface: Media
        Get a list of recent comments on a media object. The public_content scope is required for media that does not belong to the owner of the access_token.
        Specified by:
        comments in interface Media
        Parameters:
        media_id - media_id
        Returns:
        CommentsResponse @link{CommentsResponse}
        See Also:
        https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/comments/#get_media_comments

      • likes

        public UsersInfoResponse likes(String media_id)
        Description copied from interface: Media
        Get a list of users who have liked this media. The public_content scope is required for media that does not belong to the owner of the access_token.

        Returns:

      • lookupMedia

        public MediaResponse lookupMedia(String media_id)
        Description copied from interface: Media
        Get information about a media object. Use the type field to differentiate between image and video media in the response. You will also receive the user_has_liked field which tells you whether the owner of the access_token has liked this media. The public_content permission scope is required to get a media that does not belong to the owner of the access_token.
        Specified by:
        lookupMedia in interface Media
        Parameters:
        media_id - media_id
        Returns:
        MediaResponse @link{MediaResponse}
        See Also:
        https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/media/#get_media

      • shortcode

        public MediaResponse shortcode(String shortcode)
        Description copied from interface: Media
        This endpoint returns the same response as GET /media/media-id. A media object's shortcode can be found in its shortlink URL. An example shortlink is http://instagram.com/p/tsxp1hhQTG/. Its corresponding shortcode is tsxp1hhQTG.
        Specified by:
        shortcode in interface Media
        Parameters:
        shortcode - shortcode
        Returns:
        MediaResponse @link{MediaResponse}
        See Also:
        https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/media/#get_media_by_shortcode
